text.__SUMMARY__: Common names: Uracoan rattlesnake.Crotalus vegrandis is a venomous pitviper species found only in Venezuela in South America.
text.Description: Klauber (1997) gives two maximum lengths: 636 mm for the largest measured specimen, and 684 mm as the greatest value from a report believed to be reliable.
text.Geographic range: Found only in the type locality, which is "Maturín Savannah, near Uracoa, Sotillo District, State of Monagas, Venezuela."
